Sorcery > Instant
Each player chooses up to two noncreature cards from his or her graveyard and returns them to his or her hand. > Each player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library, then draws four cards.
The next noncreature spell you cast this turn may be cast without paying it’s mana cost. > Creed of the Desolate deals damage to target creature equal to the number of cards in your hand. You gain that much life.

cards.rules_text:
When Magistrate of the Voidstone enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may name a nonland card.
Activated abilities of the last card named with Magistrate of the Voidstone can’t be activated.
cards.notes: fluffy: by —> with (since it’s exiled with in other cards)

cards.rules_text:
When Magistrate of the Meddler enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may name a nonland card.
The last card named with Magistrate of the Meddler can’t be cast.

When Magistrate of the Echoes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may name a nonland card.
Whenever the last card named with Magistrate of the Echoes is put into a player’s graveyard from anywhere, search that player’s graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.
cards.notes: fluffy: enters —> is put into, players —> player’s, by —> with

cards.rules_text:
When Magistrate of the Parasite enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may name a land card.
Whenever the last card named with Magistrate of the Parasite enters the battlefield, Magistrate of the Parasite deals 2 damage to that land’s controller.

When Magistrate of the Awakening enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may name a permanent card.
At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, untap all permanents with the name last named with Magistrate of the Awakening.
cards.notes:
fluffy: during —> at the beginning of

fluffy: by —> with
